887:4: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 1||
887:8: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 2||
887:9: ratne dīpaṅkarākhyo maṇikusumajinaḥ śrīvipaśyī śikhī ca
887:10: viśvambhuḥ śrīkakutsaḥ sa ca kanakamuniḥ kāśyapaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ|
887:12: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 3||
887:16: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 4||
887:19: ekāṃśaṃ pañca bhūtvā viharati satataṃ pañcabuddhātmako'sau
887:20: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 5||
887:21: yā prajñā guhyarūpā tridalakamalajā santu devaprasādā
887:24: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 6||
887:29: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 7||
887:33: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 8||
887:34: kruddhaṃ nāgādhirājaṃ kulikasamavidhaṃ trāsayan kīlavad yo
887:37: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 9||
887:41: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 10||
887:44: śvāsaṃ saṃdhāya bhavyaṃ sakalaguṇapadaṃ prāpya garteśasaṃjñāḥ
887:45: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 11||
887:49: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 12||
887:53: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 13||
887:54: śaṃkhaṃ dadhmau saharṣaḥ smaradamitasutaṃ vikramāt prāptasiddhiḥ
887:57: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 14||
887:59: pārvatyā yatra tepe kalahanivasane śāntatīrthaḥ praśāntaḥ|
887:61: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 15||
887:65: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 16||
887:69: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 17||
887:71: prādāt sallakṣaṇaṃ yaḥ svapayasi saratāṃ tīrthasallakṣaṇākhyaḥ|
887:73: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhātāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 18||
887:77: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 19||
887:81: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 20||
887:85: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 21||
887:89: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 22||
887:93: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 23||
887:95: chitvā śoṣe hrade'smin puravarakamalo lokavāsāḥ parasya|
887:97: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 24||
887:98: saukhāvatyāśca vaṅgaṃ tadanu janahite potale prāgamad yaḥ
887:101: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ|| 25||
